entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 10:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
